Code management
[Compiler implementation]

Collaboration diagram for Code management:

Detailed Description

To allocate the code we use a vector, because it's faster to generate code iterating over it, after parsing has finished.

Also, we should not pay too much for reallocation, because we don't expect it to happen, given the initial vector size.
